title: Collected Plays: Tughlaq, Hayavadana, Bali: The Sacrifice, Naga-Mandala, Volume 1
description: This book is the first volume of a collection of plays by Girish Karnad, one of India's foremost dramatists and actors. It contains Tughlaq , Hayavana , The Sacrifice , and Naga-Mandala .
author: Girish Karnad
